channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: H&R Block Coupons and Deals: 20% Off Tax Prep in 2025
item.description: Save 20% online and when you visit your local H&R Block store. You can save up to $50 when you use one of our (unique) codes.

item.title: Where to Stream 2025’s Best Picture Oscar Nominees
item.description: Wicked, Anora, The Brutalist—many of this year’s Academy Award nominees are available to watch online. Here’s where to steam the 2025 Oscar movies.

item.title: Your Boss Wants You Back in the Office. This Surveillance Tech Could Be Waiting for You
item.description: Warehouse-style employee tracking tech has expanded into job after job. Now, as millions are called back to the workplace, it’s finally coming for the...

item.title: Google makes it easier to delete personal info from Search results
item.description: Google announced on Wednesday that it’s updating its “Results about you” tool to make it easier for users to protect and remove their personal informa...

item.title: 8 Best Toaster Ovens (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Toaster ovens are the Swiss Army knives of the modern kitchen. Our top pick could replace your full-size oven.

item.title: YouTube surpasses 1B monthly podcast viewers

item.title: Microsoft finalizes its EU sovereign cloud project
item.description: Microsoft says that it has completed a multi-year project to allow Europe-based customers using its cloud services to store and process data in the EU...

item.title: The 9 Best Mirrorless Cameras (2025): Full-Frame, APS-C, and More
item.description: Want the image quality of a DSLR without the bulk? These WIRED picks do more with less.

item.title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2025: 3 days left to save up to $1,130 on passes
